external_games.name: Something To Write About: Unbroken: Book One

name: Something To Write About: Unbroken - Book One
storyline:
Fighting has always been in your blood. From petty street fights, to Ranger school and finally to the 5th Special Forces Group, fighting was the only thing that made sense.

Years after leaving the service you find yourself living in the heart of London, carving a path in the competitive world of Mixed Martial Arts. Not the life you had envisioned, but comfortable nonetheless.

When a sudden tragedy thrusts you back into the past you'd left behind and the only link a young woman has to the rest of the world you find yourself with a new outlook on life.

Can you navigate the dangerous world of professional sports, while managing to keep yourself and those around you safe and sane? Or will you finally succumb to the pressure around you and break?

You won't be alone on this journey however, meet the lovely group of ladies who will join you.
summary: Unbroken brings you into the world of a young professional athlete and former soldier, navigating your life,friendships, relationships and your complicated past. The choices you make will not only impact yourself, but everybody around you, choose wisely.
